name: Household Agent
description: An agent for a household that can trade energy and respond to grid commands.

skills.name: Get SoC Data
skills.description: Returns the current state of charge and generation data.

skills.name: Curtail Generation
skills.description: Reduces or stops energy generation based on grid requirements.

skills.name: Sell Surplus Energy
skills.description: Acts as a BPP to sell surplus energy. Initiates a UEI transaction to offer energy to the network.

skills.name: Request Grid Power
skills.description: Acts as a BAP to purchase power from the grid. Initiates a UEI search for grid power.
